Key Match Events: Aaron Judge went 2-4 with a walk.
Brady Singer cruised for three innings.
The Captain hit his 26th home run of the year.
Alex Verdugo homered to put the Yankees ahead 3-2.
Hunter Renfroe hit a home run.
James McCarthur allowed three hits, a walk, and a home run by Austin Wells.
Austin Wells hit two home runs.
Chris Stratton allowed five baserunners, of which three scored.
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals are trying to clinch a playoff spot.
Bobby Witt Jr. is vying for the American League MVP against Aaron Judge.
Post-Match Reflections: Kansas City’s magic number for the third Wild Card slot is 13.
With 17 games left, the Royals can get nearly all of those by themselves.
